select{font-size:14px;font-weight:400;color:hsla(0,0%,100%,.65);background:#0d112b;border:none}.footer__language_selector select:hover{color:hsla(0,0%,100%,.8)}.legal__list{list-style-type:none;margin:0;padding:0}.legal__list-item{display:block;color:#e8e8e8;letter-spacing:.15em;text-transform:uppercase;font-size:11px;font-weight:500;margin:10px 0 4px;padding:0 12px;position:relative}.legal__list-item:not(:last-child):after{content:"";position:absolute;right:0;top:4px;bottom:4px;border-right:1px solid rgba(86,91,115,.65)}.legal__list-item:after{display:none}@media screen and (min-width:768px){.legal__list-item{display:inline-block}.legal__list-item:after{display:block}}.legal__link{display:inline-block;color:#e8e8e8;padding:4px 12px;margin:-4px -12px}.legal__link:hover{color:#636985}.legal__link--language{padding-left:22px;background:url(data:image/svg+xml;base64,) left 45% no-repeat transparent;position:relative}.legal__link--language span{cursor:pointer}.legal__link--hidden{display:none}.language__selector{display:none;position:absolute;bottom:150%;left:50%;margin-left:-32px;background:#222840;padding:20px 26px}.language__selector--show{display:block}.language__selector:after{content:"";position:absolute;left:32px;margin-left:-14px;top:100%;width:0;height:0;border-color:#222840 transparent transparent;border-style:solid;border-width:10px 14px}.language__link{color:hsla(0,0%,100%,.9);display:block;width:140px;padding:2px 0;font-weight:300;text-transform:none;letter-spacing:0;text-align:left}.language__link:hover{text-decoration:underline;color:#fff}img[src^="https://vidassets.terminus.services"]{display:none}

*,:after,:before{box-sizing:border-box}.language-picker-wrapper{position:relative}@media (min-width:640px){.language-picker-wrapper{margin-right:10px}.language-picker-wrapper:after{display:inline-block;content:"";background:hsla(0,0%,91%,.75);width:1px;height:1em;transform:translateY(3px)}}.language-picker-wrapper:focus .language-list,.language-picker-wrapper:hover .language-list{visibility:visible;display:block}.language-picker{text-transform:uppercase;display:inline-block;cursor:pointer}.language-picker:hover{color:#f22f46}.language-picker img.flag{background-color:#fff}.language-list-wrapper{position:absolute;top:100%;left:0;padding-top:5px}.language-list{margin:0;padding:8px 10px;border-radius:4px;background:#f22f46;visibility:hidden;display:none;z-index:6}.language-list li.language{display:block;color:#fff;font-size:14px;font-weight:400;line-height:24px;padding:8px 10px;cursor:pointer;margin:0}.language-list li.language:hover{background:hsla(0,0%,100%,.25);border-radius:3px}.language-list li.language a{text-decoration:none;color:inherit}
